caption.title: Species lag behind their thermal niche optima.
caption.p: (A, C) Lag in climate tracking of the 40 warmest adapted species after climate change for the uniform (where SM distribution SD = 0), variable dispersal (upper row), and trade-off scenario (lower row). (B, D) Correlation coefficient between the absolute lag behind their thermal niche optimum and seed mass. A positive correlation coefficient indicates a smaller lag for smaller seeds; a negative correlation indicates a smaller lag for larger seeds.
